author: Scott Heidler
title: Thailand virus curbs: Tourist industry hit as visitors stay away
description: Thai officials estimate that tourism industry will be badly affected in 2020 due to global coronavirus lockdowns.
content:
Thai officials estimate that tourism, a mainstay of the country's economy, could be down by 60 percent this year due to global coronavirus lockdowns and travel restrictions.
Many tourists who come to Thailand also visit its elephant camps.
But with visitor … [+129 chars]
